sections.heading: (Rule 29(a)) Motion for directed verdict abolished--Judgment of acquittal entered with or without motion on close of evidence for either side--Defendant's right to offer evidence after denial of motion

sections.heading: (Rule 29(b)) Reservation of decision on motion made at close of trial--Time of ruling.
sections.text: (Rule 29(b)) Reservation of decision on motion made at close of trial--Time of ruling.

sections.heading: (Rule 29(c)) Motion made after discharge of jury--Setting aside guilty verdict--Prior motion not required.
sections.text: (Rule 29(c)) Motion made after discharge of jury--Setting aside guilty verdict--Prior motion not required.

sections.heading: Renewal of motion not required for review on appeal.
sections.text: Renewal of motion not required for review on appeal.
